caption: This photograph captures a serene rural scene featuring a large brown cow with a white face grazing in a lush green field. On the back of the cow, a white bird, possibly an egret, is perched comfortably. The background is a wide-open landscape dotted with a few trees and a clear blue sky overhead. To the left edge of the photo, there is a partial view of a palm-like plant, adding a touch of wilderness to the scene. The overall ambiance is peaceful, emphasizing a symbiotic relationship between different species within a pastoral setting.
title: Cattle egret
